price: Dijo Moisés: "¡Oh, Faraón! Soy un Mensajero del Señor del universo.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāfir'ʿawnu innī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
